label: Yousef Amar
desc:
Welcome to AmarPort.com!
Above is a network of projects I have worked on over the years; a portfolio if you will.
For more information on any project, click its (draggable) node.

Click here for a PDF file of my CV.

children.label: Web
children.desc: This category contains web apps and anything web app related.

children.label: Front End
children.desc: Everything predominantly front end that can be seen on a webpage, including anything HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript related can be found here.

children.label: Back End
children.desc: Everything predominantly back end that runs out of sight on a server, including anything PHP and SQL related can be found here.
